mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of John A. Kitterman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of John A. Kitterman W. R. Kitterman, Administrator Exception to report of Commissioner Morgan, 10.12.1896 J.T. Agnew J.T. Agee Recorded in Ledger Book 4, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
